entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Naujaat
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 09:36 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Drifting Snow, -40.4°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Naujaat 11:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
Condition: Drifting Snow
Temperature: -40.4°C
Pressure: 100.4 kPa
Visibility: 16.1 km
Humidity: 59 %
Wind Chill: -59
Dewpoint: -45.3°C
Wind: NNW 29 km/h gust 42 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 37.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind north 30 km/h becoming light this afternoon. High minus 37. Wind chill minus 59 this morning and minus 49 this afternoon. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 41.
entry.summary: Increasing cloudiness this evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 41. Wind chill near minus 52. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of light snow. High minus 35. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 35. Wind chill minus 52 in the morning and minus 45 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 10:00 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023
